title: rAghavEndra guru
sahitya:
rAghavEndra guru mAnatOsmi satatam nAgarAja shayanAsyutArccana ratham


anupallavi

  rAga mOhAdi rahitam sucaritamsvAkamapi dAyaka madhva munihitam


caraNam    shrI sutIndra guru karAbja samjAtam vAsudEva paramAnugraha bharitam 
bhAsura vara tuLasImaNi hArayutam bhUsurAdi vinutam vAtIndranatam
